channel.title: Wolfenstein 3d on Jefklaks Codex
channel.description: Recent content in Wolfenstein 3d on Jefklaks Codex

item.title: Early Shooter Clones
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: People feeling nostalgic can play enhanced versions the games: For Quake, you’ll need: ezQuake Win32 Installer (Just install in a directory) Pak0.pak Quake Demo version (Or copy pak0 and pak1 from your original Qake) Create a new dir in the ezQuake install dir called “id1” and Unzip pak0.pak Play! (start with ezstart, press ESC in the console!) For Duke3D, you’ll need: eDuke32 Win32 Installer (Just install in a directory) Duke3D Demo - only keep DUKE.
